item.title: Keeping LG webOS Developer Mode alive with Home Assistant
item.description:
For over 10 years I’ve used Kodi on a separate PC connected to a TV to play back local media.

A couple of weeks ago everything changed in a matter of days. I listened to Late Night Linux â€“ Episode 179 where they talked about Jellyfin. I have looked into Jellyfin before, however I’ve disregarded it due to the lack of app for LG webOS. This changed because the podcast episode told that there was a webOS app for Jellyfin.
